| History                 = The '''Department of Dinosaur Control''' is a joint task force between the [[American Museum of Natural History]] and the [[Bronx Zoo]], which was dedicated to detaining [[Dinosaurs|dinosaurs]] that threatened [[New York City]].{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 5}}

After [[Amadeus Cho (Earth-616)|Hulk]] attacked and defeated [[Devil Dinosaur (Earth-78411)|Devil Dinosaur]] on [[Essex Street]] in the [[Lower East Side]],{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 4}} the mutant [[Devil-Beast]] was turned over to the Department of Dinosaur Control where he was held at the American Museum of Natural History on the [[Manhattan#Upper West Side|Upper West Side]] until [[Lunella Lafayette (Earth-616)|Moon Girl]] broke into the facility and the pair smashed their way past both the Department of Dinosaur Control personnel, as well as the [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]].{{r|Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur Vol 1 5}}
